function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Occupants' proximity in small spaces","Impact":"Increased likelihood of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Encourage ventilation and outdoor activities, implement social distancing protocols","Technologies":"Air purifiers, ventilation systems","People":"Occupants, household members, elderly","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Multi-functional rooms","Impact":"Increased contact and shared spaces","Mitigation":"Promote partitioning of spaces and dedicated areas for different activities","Technologies":"Room dividers, partitions","People":"Household members, occupants","Owner":"Architects, interior designers, homeowners"},{"Description":"Reliance on kerosene lamps for lighting","Impact":"Health risks from indoor air pollution","Mitigation":"Transition to cleaner and safer lighting solutions, improve indoor air quality","Technologies":"LED lighting, indoor air purifiers","People":"Household members, occupants","Owner":"Government, energy providers"}]}
